s: My Singing Monsters is a unique musical world-builder game developed for the mobile platform. It unites a passion for music and play with the irresistible challenge of collecting. Each charming character adds its own unique voice to a growing musical menagerie.

t: My Singing Monsters – Big Blue Bubble
